heading: HB03401
0: AN ACT MANDATING ALL BUSES, TRUCKS, AND OTHER HEAVY VEHICLES TO UNDERGO PREVENTIVE MAINTENANCE WITH THEIR RESPECTIVE COMPANIES AND MONTHLY INSPECTIONS WITH THE LAND TRANSPORTATION OFFICE (LTO) TO PREVENT ACCIDENT DUE TO MECHANICAL MALFUNCTION/FAILURE AND TO ENSURE ROAD SAFETY
